org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.openstack
Class OpenStackCloudifyDriver

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.BaseComputeDriver
      org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.BaseProvisioningDriver
          org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.openstack.OpenStackCloudifyDriver

public class OpenStackCloudifyDriver
extends BaseProvisioningDriver

Openstack Driver which creates security groups and networks.

Since:
2.7.0
Author:
victor

Field Detail

OPT_KEY_PAIR

public static final String OPT_KEY_PAIR
Key to set keyPairName.
For instance: keyPairName="cloudify"

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OPENSTACK_ENDPOINT

public static final String OPENSTACK_ENDPOINT
Key to set endpoint.
For instance: openstack.endpoint="https://:5000/v2.0/"

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OPT_COMPUTE_SERVICE_NAME

public static final String OPT_COMPUTE_SERVICE_NAME
Set the name to search to find openstack compute endpoint (default="nova").
For instance: computeServiceName="nova"

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OPT_NETWORK_SERVICE_NAME

public static final String OPT_NETWORK_SERVICE_NAME
Set the name to search to find openstack networking endpoint (default="neutron").
For instance: networkServiceName="quantum"

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OPT_NETWORK_API_VERSION

public static final String OPT_NETWORK_API_VERSION
Set the network api version (default="v2.0").
The Openstack network api need version in the URL (i.e.: https://192.168.2.100:9696/v2.0/networks). So we might need to provide the version number to the cloud driver.
For instance: networkApiVersion="v2.0"

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OPT_SKIP_EXTERNAL_NETWORKING

public static final String OPT_SKIP_EXTERNAL_NETWORKING
Specify if you want the driver to handle the external networking (default="false").
By default, the driver will create a router and link it to an external network. If this property is set to false the driver will ignore this step.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OPT_EXTERNAL_ROUTER_NAME

public static final String OPT_EXTERNAL_ROUTER_NAME
Use an existing external router.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OPT_EXTERNAL_NETWORK_NAME

public static final String OPT_EXTERNAL_NETWORK_NAME
Specify an external network to use. If no name is configured, the driver will pick the first external network it will find.
If you specify externalRouterName, this property is ignored.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

startMachine

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails startMachine(ProvisioningContext context,
                                                                              long duration,
                                                                              TimeUnit unit)
                                                                       throws TimeoutException,
                                                                              CloudProvisioningException
Description copied from class: BaseComputeDriver
Starts an additional machine on the cloud , on the specific location, to scale out this specific service. In case of an error while provisioning the machine, any allocated resources should be freed before throwing a CloudProvisioningException or TimeoutException to the caller.

Overrides:
startMachine in class BaseComputeDriver
Parameters:
context - the provisioning context for this machine.
duration - Time duration to wait for the instance.
unit - Time unit to wait for the instance.
Returns:
The details of the started instance.
Throws:
TimeoutException - In case the instance was not started in the allotted time.
CloudProvisioningException - If a problem was encountered while starting the machine.

Throws:
